emove retained pieces of placenta 
& membranes digitally or with 
sponge holding forceps, under 
supervision of M.O.
Uterus well contracted. 
(Traumatic PPH)
Soft  and fl abby Uterus 
(Atonic PPH)
Look for tears/lacerations 
in vagina/cervix.
Administer Uterotonics 
continue Uterine massage
/circle6  Inj Oxytocin 20 U in 500ml 
of RL/DNS-I/VPack the vagina and refer to FRU*
Bimanual Compression of Uterus
Hardening of the uterus felt Patient still bleeding & uterus remains fl abby
Continue uterin
